TopicTitle: How does Crafts Save and Load work in KSP2 ?

Articles.Content:
Am I the only one who didn't understand how the LOAD craft work?
It saves a workspace... AND a Craft?
Each workspace contains more crafts?
Like a Folder? But it doesn't seem to work like that... 
 
Why I can see my crafts listed when SAVING and not when LOADING ?

Is it bugged or it's just not clear to me?

In VAB you save and load a workspace. Vehicle name is the name of currently chosen assembly, and is the one you'd be picking when launching straight from the launchpad. Yes, workspace can have any number of vehicles you want. And it is the equivalent of craft file in KSP1, so do not overwrite the workspace name unless you want to lose whatever was there before, logically.

It needs some work but is intuitive once you figure out the idea behind it.

Edited March 2, 2023 by The Aziz
